ygData.subject: Re: Get a life everybody
ygData.msgSnippet: Crow Lord, if you can t keep up with the emails, then dont. But don t bug people about it. I m sure you have an interesting life (sitting in a chair and hoping

Subject: Re: Get a life everybody

Crow Lord, if you can't keep up with the emails, then dont. But don't bug 
people about it. I'm sure you have an interesting life (sitting in a chair 
and hoping for a girl all day could be interesting, I guess), so go and live 
it, and stop bothering the rest of us.

And everyone, please cut down the number of irrelevant OOC mails (Get a life 
included). If you don't like the beach, SoulStice, have Sinister argue 
through IC, not OOC.

To rskieper@..., you can set eGroups not to send you any mail, and read 
it at egroups.com/messages/nbwrpg, so your account doesn't get millions of 
emails.

Everyone that still wants to argue, there is a message board on the site, 
along with a chat room, both of which were put up for OOC purposes that have 
nothing or little to do with the RPG (like "I'm an idiot who doesn't have a 
life but wants everyone else to get one" (Crow Lord)).
